268.    Weather Station  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=A-Minor" title="A-Minor">A-Minor</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.aminor.weatherstation"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5hbWlub3Iud2VhdGhlcnN0YXRpb24QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This app is perfect for amateur and pro meteorologists, outdoor enthusiasts, and anyone else curious about their environment.<p><br>Most Android devices still do not have a barometer, ambient thermometer, or hygrometer. See the (probably incomplete) COMPATIBILITY list below for devices that this app is useful with.</p><p>For those who desire more, consider donating by purchasing Weather Station Pro. PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE FREE VERSION OF WEATHER STATION FIRST to make sure your device has the sensors for the types of readings you want. </p><p>***IF UPGRADING FROM v1.3.1.8 OR LOWER TO v2.0.0 OR HIGHER YOU WILL HAVE TO UNINSTALL THE OLD VERSION AND REBOOT FIRST. A "-24" error code appears during update. This error doesn't affect the app and only appears when you try to update. It is recommended you uninstall the old version of the app and reboot your device before reinstalling. If you don't want to update you can disable auto updates for the app in Google Play.</p><p><br>FEATURES</p><p>• No ads<br>• Depending on device, supports: Ambient Temperature, Pressure, Relative Humidity, Absolute Humidity, Dew Point, Mixing Ratio, Heat Index, Illuminance, |Magnetic Field|, and Barometric, GPS, &amp; Density Altitude<br>• Graphs with details including 24 hour and 7 day hi &amp; lo markers <br>• Pro only: 14 day graphing<br>• Pro only: 14 day hi &amp; lo markers on graphs also<br>• Pro only: Multi-Series graphing able to graph any number of (normalized) reading types<br>• Pro only: Ongoing Status Bar Notification (ideal for Temperature but can be used for any of the reading types in the range of -20 to 120)<br>• Pro only: Sunrise/Set info<br>• Pro only: Moon info<br>• Notification alerts<br>• Records set by your device<br>• Share screenshots<br>• Printing support (Android KitKat+)<br>• Unit choices for temperature/dew point/heat index (°F, °C, K), pressure (mb, inHg, kPa, atm, Torr, psi, hPa, mmHg), absolute humidity (g/m³, kg/m³), mixing ratio (g/kg, kg/kg), and elevation/altitude (ft, m)<br>• Pressure can be adjusted to mean sea level using the Altimeter Setting<br>• Use GPS provided elevation/altitude for pressure adjustments<br>• 5 widget types (4x1, 1x4, and 3 1x1) with 3 style choices (on Android 4.2+ these widgets are also available for the lock screen)<br>• Widgets are highly customizable including text color and size<br>• Pro only: Full size widget with icons<br>• Pro only: Widgets have several color theme choices<br>• Pro only: Light and dark application themes<br>• Indicators for rising/falling/steady readings<br>• 24 hour hi &amp; lo readings on main screen<br>• Calibration of raw values output by sensors<br>• Pro only: Experimental battery temperature based calibration for offsetting inaccurate ambient temperature and relative humidity readings<br>• Export background readings to .txt files<br>• Pro only: Unlimited Auto Logging of background readings with geo coordinates to .txt files<br>• Localized numbers and dates &amp; times<br>• Pro only: Settings and data from Weather Station v2.0.0 or higher can be transferred to Pro on first start</p><p>The 'About' section in the app has much more detail on how Weather Station works.</p><p>---</p><p>COMPATIBILITY</p><p>Devices with a hygrometer, thermometer, and barometer:<br>Samsung Galaxy:<br>S4 (IV)<br>Note 3 (III)</p><p>Devices with only a barometer:<br>LG Nexus:<br>5<br>4<br>Samsung Galaxy:<br>S4 Active<br>S3<br>Note 2 (II)<br>Nexus<br>Note<br>Nexus class="description">  可愛超載警報！讓一些可愛到您的手機與這個優秀❤可愛天氣預報應用程序❤！我們已經創造了市場上最好的準確天氣部件。這種天氣應用程序不僅顯示準確的天氣條件，但它也顯示精確的日期和時間。下載數字時鐘部件，從不擔心時間了！喜歡使用這個可愛的天氣預報，時鐘部件！天气和时钟部件的!<p>❤可愛天氣預報應用程序❤為您提供：<br>10數字時鐘，5解鎖，5鎖定。<br>每天都有新的數字時鐘可用。<br>把精彩的時鐘部件您的主屏幕上。<br>不同大小和形狀的頂端部件的時鐘。<br>世界天氣和當地的天氣小部件。<br>自動檢測您當前的位置。<br>找出有關的溫度，濕度，壓力，雲量，和風速。<br>日出和日落時間。<br>易於使用的成人和兒童。</p><p>如何使用這樣的天氣和時鐘部件：<br>❤首先，你必須添加“時鐘小工具”到你的主屏幕！<br>❤根據您的設備，你應該向下滾動到菜單，然後按Add按鈕，或者在空長按屏幕上，直到彈出窗口標記添加到主屏幕出來。<br>❤你可能需要找到+按鈕或選項WIDGET的時鐘添加到您的屏幕。</p><p>❤可愛天氣預報應用程序❤包含10個漂亮的數字時鐘與可愛的設計。其中五人被解鎖並可供立即使用，五人被鎖定（一個每天解鎖）。這個免費的數字時鐘部件為您提供準確的天氣信息和準確的日期和時間。如果你現在就下載和您的神話般的Andr​​oid設備上安裝它，你再也不會有佩戴的手錶或觀看天氣頻道。讓這個可愛的氣象雷達到您的手機，你將永遠知道出門前穿什麼衣服。時鐘部件和天氣預報 - 在一個應用程序！时钟天气预报微件! </p><p>你有沒有感到意外，突然夏雨？你是否曾經被濕透，因為你忘了你的傘？你有沒有穿長袖的一個非常熱的天？我們有一個很好的治愈你！這每小時天氣插件來幫助你打扮的天氣。這樣的天氣應用程序顯示在三個公制單位天氣溫度：華氏攝氏度，和開爾文。它還顯示濕度，氣壓，雲量，風速，日落和日出的時間。這個世界上的天氣預報和時間部件為您提供準確的日期，時間和天氣條件在當地和全球 - PM2.5預報霧霾-愛呼吸  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Airhuxi.com" title="Airhuxi.com">Airhuxi.com</a> data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  愛呼吸: 首創PM2.5預報霧霾App<br>1. 領先全國PM2.5霧霾預報系統，及即時指數查詢<br>2. 未來72小時空氣污染預測及品質排名 - 覆蓋全國主要城市<br>3. 健康呼吸資訊 - 送上最新防霾秘笈，即時及預測消息<br>4. 個性化健康提示 - 為您關心的兒童、長者等提供針對性建議<br>5. 健康小店 - 每週精選健康商品，以香港批發價回饋用戶<br>6. 天天看預報，日日儲紅包 - 於軟體內用紅包搶折購<p>-------- 關於愛呼吸 --------<br>愛呼吸，是國內首創PM2.5預報的手機應用(App)，能夠為全國主要城市預測未來72小時的PM2.5含量，並提供即時霧霾指數查詢，為不同群體的用戶提供個性化的健康及防護建議。</p><p>為了幫助市民預知霧霾影響、做好健康防護，PM2.5預報需要解決一系列困難而複雜的科研問題。團隊由多名科學與工程系博士所組成，一直研究PM2.5的擴散及模擬模型，集成全國領先的資料分析、大資料和高性能雲計算技術，為公眾計算未來PM2.5的預測值。愛呼吸App使用者介面清新簡潔，極易操作。</p><p>愛呼吸 -- 小程式，大關懷。</p><p>-------- 聯繫我們 --------<br>電郵: cs@airhuxi.com<br>官網: http://www.airhuxi.com</p><p>愛呼吸 (香 港) 有限公司</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="華氏轉攝氏" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh5.ggpht.com/JSxbZ4ElTQdT75smTbDTY6AdM6BGc1qlZQZY9E39M4tHTTA-jOZwmjGPieAH5jnOxg=w340-rw" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.holiestep.temperature" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.holiestep.temperature" title="華氏轉攝氏"> 282.    華氏轉攝氏  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=HOLIESTEP" title="HOLIESTEP">HOLIESTEP</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.holiestep.temperature"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5ob2xpZXN0ZXAudGVtcGVyYXR1cmUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  華氏 = 攝氏*(9/5)+32 <br>攝氏 = (華氏-32)*5/9<br>正常體溫是攝氏37度 (華氏98.6度). <br>正常體溫不是固定的。最高在下午，最低在午夜二時至四時，相差可達攝氏半度或華氏一度。 <br>正常體溫也會因運動或過多衣物而稍高。 <br>什麼是發燒？<br>發燒即體溫不正常地上升了: 即肛探華氏一百度或攝氏三十八度以上，或口探華氏九十九度或攝氏三十七度半以上。一般以水銀探熱針作準。<p>發燒的護理須知 : <br>-應少穿衣服及少蓋被，多喝清水，可幫助散熱；<br>-應盡量給病人充足的睡眠和休息；<br>-應保持室內空氣流通及清新；不要關閉門戶，適當地利用電風扇或冷氣機來降低室溫，有助病人散熱；<br>-可用溫水給小孩抹身或沐浴，每次約十分鐘，讓水的揮發減低體溫；（注意：請不要用火酒來抹身）<br>-可服用醫生處方的退燒藥；不過退燒藥只能暫時降低體溫，藥力過後體溫便可能再回升，待疾病痊癒後，體溫自然會回復正常；故此病人或家長不用太擔心為何吃藥也不退藥，只要按醫生的吩咐定時服藥，則可控制病徵；<br>-一般病症的發燒現象都會持續數天才減退，若病情沒有惡化，病人是可以放心按醫生的吩咐繼續吃藥，並觀察病情的住展。</p><p>Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Holiestep</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.holiestep.temperature" aria-hidden="true" If you enjoy it, please upgrade to full version!</p><p>Weather Now is a fabulous combination of weather live wallpaper, which animates local weather, time of day and season on ANY custom background, and a set of beautiful weather widgets! </p><p>Based on an original idea, Weather Now lets you pick image from your gallery (or use one of embedded images) and put animation of your current weather right over it on your home screen. Easy-to-setup, customizable and beautiful weather widgets will also bring you all local weather info you need, including detailed weather conditions and 5-days forecast.</p><p>Gorgeous Weather Live Wallpaper<br>★ Local or custom weather animations over any image from your gallery<br>★ Animated sun, moon, rain, snow, stars, clouds, lightning, fog and frost<br>★ Stunning weather effects like raindrops or snowflakes on screen<br>★ Time of day, seasons and color animations<br>★ Cool color effects and photo filters like winter, spring, summer, autumn, sepia, b&amp;w and neon<br>★ Manual control of brightness, contrast, saturation and hue<br>★ Embedded image gallery<br>★ Slideshow<br>★ Special 3D panoramic mode<br>★ Easy-to-use settings with interactive preview<br>★ Daydream support<br>★ More features inside!</p><p>Beautiful Weather Widgets<br>★ Customizable backgrounds, colors and fonts<br>★ Customizable units, formats and application shortcuts<br>★ Home screen and lock screen layouts<br>★ Easy-to-use settings with interactive preview <br>★ Customizable weather update interval<br>★ Several different weather providers (including AccuWeather and Weather Underground)</p><p>Local Weather Forecast<br>★ Current weather conditions, RealFeel, high and low temp<br>★ Today, tonight and tomorrow predictions<br>★ Humidity, Pressure, Precipitation, UV, Wind Speed and Direction information<br>★ Sunset and Sunrise information<br>★ 5-days forecast</p><p>All weather effects can be tuned for your taste. Clouds, snow and rain depend on current wind speed and direction. Moon shows actual moon phase.</p><p>You can choose between real weather conditions or pick whatever you want right now. You can easily create your own live wallpapers such as snowfalls, rainstorms, lightning storms, frosted windows, rainy screens, sunny days with delighted sun-rays and so on. </p><p>All effects and animations can be applied to ANY image from your gallery, whether it is a real photo or your favorite wallpaper. Full HD ready, no quality loss!</p><p>Weather Now works well on both phone and tablet devices, uses low system resources and conserves your battery life!</p><p>HELPFUL TIPS</p><p>Widgets cannot be used when installed on SD, it's a system requirement. To add Weather &amp; Clock info, please open your apps, switch to widgets tab and search for Weather Now widgets there. Long-tap on a widget you want and drag it onto your home screen.</p><p>You can adjust Sun and Moon positions depending on your current background with your fingers. Drag them slowly!</p><p>Raindrops can be cleaned from screen by your fingers too!</p><p>Battery and RAM usage could be more than expected for live wallpaper because of settings with interactive preview and widgets. You do not have to worry about it, Android manages memory by itself.</p><p>In order to use automatic location, Google Location Service should be enabled in system settings. If you want to manually set your location but unable to find your city, try to type it in English, please.</p><p>PERMISSIONS EXPLAINED</p><p>COARSE LOCATION required to locate automatically and 世界天氣是一個清潔，簡單的天氣應用程序來顯示當前的天氣和預測。僅此而已，無所不及。<p>得到最準確的局部電流條件下，預測，多普勒天氣雷達和最快的災害性天氣警報。</p><p>現在世界上的天氣讓你的靈活性，更容易獲得最準確的預測和最快的災害性天氣。</p><p>實時針點預測全球的位置 - 世界各個城市，為您的鄰居最精確的電流，延長和每小時天氣預報及數以百萬計。用25％更準確的預測，未來24小時內（相對於其他的天氣應用程序）。</p><p>世界天氣虛擬窗口外面的世界，您可以查看當前的天氣藝術渲染描寫。</p><p>世界氣象自動更新以最接近氣象站您在通過GPS你的鄰居你的天氣信息。得到的實時氣象傳感器在世界上最大的網絡的最新的溫度，降水，風能，太陽能，濕度和壓力的信息。</p><p>檢查的天氣條件一覽為您保存的所有位置。</p><p>下載世界天氣訪問全球最大的實時天氣和雷電感應器網絡的最佳預測，最快警報等。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> 299.    香港天晴 - 香港天氣和時鐘 Widget  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=30Sparks" title="30Sparks">30Sparks</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.thirtysparks.sunny"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS50aGlydHlzcGFya3Muc3VubnkQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  香港天氣，一目了然。<p><br>「香港天晴」以簡潔漂亮的介面，讓你們快速查看香港的天氣，令天氣查詢也變得賞心悅目。</p><p><br>「香港天晴」專為香港人設計，使用香港天文台的天氣資料，能提供你所在的地區天氣資料和天氣預測，並顯示天文台發出的天氣警告。介面使用一頁式的設計，讓你快速查看天氣，配以精美的香港風景照片，賞心悅目。程式提供桌面 Widget 小工具，可自訂顏色及字型大小，絕對能配合你的漂亮桌布；加上通知列的天氣顯示和警告，讓你即時掌握最準確的天氣變化。</p><p>如果你覺得「我的天文台」的介面老舊過時，「香港天晴」絕對是你最好的選擇！</p><p><br>主要功能：</p><p>• 特別天氣提示<br>• 今天天氣概況、天氣預報和天氣警告等天氣資料<br>• 香港各地區的氣溫、濕度、風向風速和實時照片<br>• 天氣雷達和衛星圖像<br>• 風暴路徑圖<br>• 地區的空氣質素指數 (AQHI)和預測<br>• 日出日落時間和潮汐資料<br>• 可在通知列顯示天氣狀況和警告<br>• 以漂亮的香港相片作背景，介面簡潔漂亮<br>• 天氣和時鐘的 Widget 小工具 ，有不同的大小(1x1, 2x1, 3x1, 4x1, 4x2, 5x1 和 5x2)和可自訂顏色及字型大小<br>• 支援 Dashclock Extension (Android 4.2+)</p><p>專業版：</p><p>「香港天晴」可以免費使用，但亦可以升級為「專業版」，尊享以下功能：</p><p>• 在沒有網絡時停止排程更新，進一步節省電力。<br>• 使用小工具 Widget - 「時鐘 (大)」<br>• 推播通知<br>• 只在 WiFi 連接時下載背景圖片</p><p>請各位多多支持，謝謝。</p><p><br>「香港天晴」Facebook Page (問題回報及查詢)： <br>http://on.fb.me/1fQdXcS </p><p><br>常見問題：<br>• 權限「啟動時執行」是為了重新開機後更新小工具。<br>• 在 Android v3.0以上，小工具是可調較大小的，但有些廠商的介面不支援此功能。如遇到此情況請用電郵告之，謝謝。<br>• 在小工具上，點擊「現在溫度」可立即更新天氣資料，點擊「現在天氣」可開啟主程式，點擊按右上角的小時間即可重新開啟「小工具設定」<br>• 天氣資料是根據你所在的位置拿取，可於「設定」中指定要使用的氣象站。</p><p></p><p></p><p># 天氣資料取自香港天文台，資料版權歸其所有<br># 空氣質素資料取自環境保護署，資料版權歸其所有</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a 您可以允許和禁用通知。<br>關於小部件：小部件只有當應用程序被安裝在內部存儲的工作。如果應用程序是在外部存儲就像壹個SD卡，小部件消失。 <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.xbox.weatherforecast" <div class="description">  ♥手機時鐘天氣小工具♥是一個真棒部件屏幕。很多人喜歡定制自己的主屏幕發揮到淋漓盡致，根據自己的口味和風格裝飾他們。如果你想快速美化您的主屏幕，你應該在屏幕上顯示一個時鐘。盡快下載“手機時鐘天氣小工具”。這是一個小部件簡約顯示當前天氣情況！<p>•在顯示的天氣預報10數字時鐘，5解鎖，5鎖定。<br>•每天都有新的時鐘可用。<br>•把精彩的時鐘和天氣小工具的主屏幕上。<br>•不同尺寸和形狀的頂部部件。<br>•易於使用的成人和兒童。<br>•添加小部件來美化你的屏幕。</p><p>手機時鐘部件會讓你的畫面更動感。 href="/store/apps/details?id=com.alvin.weatherinfo" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.alvin.weatherinfo" title="温湿度计"> 314.    温湿度计  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=xiaosea" title="xiaosea">xiaosea</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.alvin.weatherinfo"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5hbHZpbi53ZWF0aGVyaW5mbxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  生活绝佳小助手"温湿度计"一共有四个板块，分别对应气温、湿度、压力、舒适度四个方面。温度方面则会给出当前环境的温度值，另外还有相应的湿度测试，包括干燥、舒适和过湿三个指标，各个指标是以仪表的形式展现。气压一定程度上决定着人们的情绪，“温湿度计”还给出我们当前的气压值，并能够测量出当前环境对人体的舒适度。你周边的当前环境如何，不妨使用“温湿度计”测量一番。<br>NOTE:The application resources are from internet. Please contact me if there is any problem. <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.alvin.weatherinfo" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.mobappcreator.app_11078_11332" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.mobappcreator.app_11078_11332" title="地震預報"> 318.    地震預報  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Yaser+S.+Samhouri" title="Yaser S. Samhouri">Yaser S. Samhouri</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.mobappcreator.app_11078_11332"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWNvbS5tb2JhcHBjcmVhdG9yLmFwcF8xMTA3OF8xMTMzMhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  經過多年潛心研究天體和我們這個星球上地震之間的關係，我已經開發出一種方法，利用天文，物理，數學（統計）和地震科學的科學預測地震。根據這一點，我可以以良好的精確度計算出的時間內，這有可能是地震的可能性高的情況發生在一定的區域的關鍵時期。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;因為我相信有多少重要的信息是，我不想嚇唬人與地震，我給他們在案例一的準備時間。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;這個應用程序的主要目的。是幫助和挽救人們的生命。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;因此，我們是不負責的任何地震預報的誤解。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;到目前為止，我們覆蓋以下地區：<br>1 ，新西蘭，斐濟，克馬德克和湯加群島。<br>2 ，日本。<br>三，台灣。<br>4，菲律賓。<br>5，泰國地區，柬埔寨，越南，老撾，緬甸，馬來西亞<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;雲南 - 中國<br>6，迪拜伊朗和南非。<br>7，希臘，阿爾巴尼亞，愛琴海，愛奧尼亞海和多德卡尼斯群島的島嶼。<br>8，意大利，斯洛文尼亞，克羅地亞和亞得里亞海。<br>9，智利，秘魯，玻利維亞和阿根廷的西部。<br>10 ，俄克拉荷馬州和堪薩斯州。<br>11 。墨西哥。<br>12 ，愛達荷州和懷俄明州（黃石地區） 。<br>13 ，加利福尼亞州，內華達州，亞利桑那州和下加利福尼亞州/墨西哥。<p>其他很多地區將在以後添加。</p><p>亞瑟S. Samhouri<br>Apr.28 ， 2014</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.mobappcreator.app_11078_11332" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.mobappcreator.app_11078_11332" tabindex="-1"> <div </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="ピンポイント天気ウィジェット" class="cover-image" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.android.tomapps" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.android.tomapps" title="ピンポイント天気ウィジェット"> 329.    ピンポイント天気ウィジェット  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=tomos_app" title="tomos_app">tomos_app</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.android.tomapps"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEmpwLmFuZHJvaWQudG9tYXBwcxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ■本アプリについて<br>3時間おきのピンポイント天気と週間天気予報を表示できるビューワウィジェットです。ウィジェットなので、ホーム画面に配置するといつでも情報を確認することができます。ほぼすべての市区町村に対応しています。<p>※アップデートしても3時間おき・週間天気とも更新されない場合は、お手数ですが一度アンインストールしてください。</p><p>■主な機能<br>・Web上の天気予報情報を表示する、天気予報ビューワ<br>・3時間ごとの天気、気温、降水量、湿度、風向、風速をウィジェットに表示<br>・週間天気予報をウィジェットに表示<br>・複数地域のウィジェットを配置可能<br>・3時間毎に情報を自動更新<br>　（スクリーンオンした際に更新時間以降かを確認し更新）<br>・ウィジェットをクリックすることで、詳細天気ビューの表示<br>・詳細天気ビューで3時間毎の天気・週間天気予報・気温などのグラフを表示<br>・詳細天気ビューでアメダス・レーダー・衛星画像（気象庁Webページから引用）を表示</p><p>■その他設定など<br>・ウィジェット表示サイズを１×２～４マスで設定可能<br>・イメージファイルを背景・天気スキンとして利用可能<br>・GPS、ネットワークでの市区町村設定<br>・気温、降水量、湿度、風向、風速はいずれか2つをウィジェット上に表示<br>・カラースキンや文字色の変更<br>・スキンの半透明化<br>・ウィジェット端クリックでの天気の表示切り替え<br>　（設定で無効化できます）<br>・ウィジェットクリックで、詳細天気ビューを表示<br>　（別画面が開きます。無効化できます）</p><p><br>機能追加、修正などのご意見、ご要望はコメント、メールにて受け付けておりますので、お気軽にご連絡ください。<br>また、ご要望の多い降水確率について、3時間おきの天気では情報配信している天気予報がないため、大変申し訳ありませんが追加が行えません。</p><p><br>■注意<br>・Web上の天気予報情報を表示する、天気予報ビューワであることを理解した上でご使用下さい。<br>・Webの情報が更新される時刻以降で、画面がONされたときに情報の更新を行います。CPU負荷低減のため、スリープ中は更新が行われません。<br>・Web上の情報を使用していますので、ページの変更等で正しく情報を取得できない場合があります。<br>・Web上の情報の更新にタイムラグがある都合上、各更新時間の10分以降に情報を更新します。<br>・負荷分散のため、各端末での更新時間が異なるように設定しています。<br>・GPSの電波状態が良くない場合、正しく受信できない、受信に数分間かかることがあります。<br>・同時に多数の地域を設定すると処理が重くなり、エラーが発生する可能性があります。エラーが発生する、処理が極端に重い場合、申し訳ありませんが、地域を減らしてご使用ください。<br>・天気予報を行なっているわけではありませんので、天気情報に関する一切の責任は負いません。</p><p>※問題の起こった方は、メール、コメントにて機種名、OSバージョン、ホームアプリの変更の有無、レイアウトが崩れる場合スクリーンショット等、詳細をご連絡いただけると幸いです。確認し次第修正させていただきます。</p><p><br>■更新履歴<br>2013.6.30：ver4.26<br>過去のレーダー、アメダス表示に対応<br>タブレットで一部のフォントサイズが小さい問題の修正</p><p>2013.5.29：ver 4.2<br>小さいフォントに対応<br>サーバに関わる処理の仕様変更<br>通知メッセージの不具合対策</p><p>2013.2.15：ver 4.15<br>新しいサーバの追加</p><p>2013.2.6：ver 4.14<br>更新が不安定になる不具合の対策<br>アメダス表示が取得できない場合がある不具合の対策<br>更新時に現在地の天気を表示する機能の追加</p><p>2013.1.30：ver 4.13<br>更新が不安定な不具合の対策</p><p>2013.1.30：ver 4.122<br>週間天気が更新されない不具合を修正</p><p>2013.1.29：ver 4.12<br>更新しない不具合を修正</p><p>2012.9.6：ver 4.11<br>アメダス表示時直後に終了した際の不具合を修正</p><p>2012.8.31：ver 4.10<br>画面回転時の不具合を修正<br>詳細天気ビューで特定条件の表示不具合を修正</p><p>2012.8.30：ver 4.09<br>メモリリークによる不具合対策</p><p>2012.8.20：ver 4.05<br>スキン設定できない不具合を修正</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.twiple.android.quake" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.twiple.android.quake" title="なまず速報 β"> 330.    なまず速報 β  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Stridge+Project+Inc." title="Stridge Project Inc.">Stridge Project Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.twiple.android.quake"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2pwLnR3aXBsZS5hbmRyb2lkLnF1YWtlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  最近の地震情報をAndroid上で閲覧することが出来ます。<p>実験的ながら地震速報をリアルタイムでプッシュ通知する事も可能です。<br>ただし、プッシュ通知機能はかならず通知を保証するものではありません。基地局、ネットワークの混雑状況、電波状況、その他の理由などにより通知されない可能性があります。過信せず他の情報源からも入手するように努めてください。<br>プッシュ通知を利用する場合は設定から有効にしてください。</p><p>最近の地震で表示されるリスト、プッシュ時の情報はともに速報値ですので実際の地震とは誤差があります。</p><p>レビューでは返信する事が出来ませんので、ご意見・ご要望・ご質問などはTwitterの @NamazuAlert http://twitter.com/NamazuAlert またはフォーラム http://namazu.twiple.jp/forum/ までお願いします。<br>また、メールでご質問などをいただいても対応できる範囲に限りがあり、返信出来かねますのでご了承ください。<br>また、企業様からのお問い合わせに関してはnamazu＠commun.jp(＠を半角)で承っております。</p><p>■ KeepAlive間隔について<br>この値は出来るだけデフォルトのまま使用してください。これを変更するとプッシュ通知が届かなくなったり、バッテリーの消費が増えたりします。<br>お使いのルータにNATタイマー、NAPT TCPタイマー、SPI TCPタイムアウトなどの設定項目がある場合、Wi-Fi KeepAliveの数値をルータの設定より1分ほど短く設定する事でバッテリーの消費を軽減出来る場合があります。</p><p><br>■ 既知の問題<br>・ISW11F、T-01D、F-05Dで現在地設定、診断情報を表示するとクラッシュする。<br>バージョン 0.5.10で修正いたしましたのでMarketから更新をお願いいたします。<br>更新後も改善しない場合は、再インストールまたはデータの削除をお試しください。</p><p>・通知が届かない。<br>回線の状況によっては届かない事があります。<br>今後の接続安定性の向上の参考にさせていただきますので、よろしければこちらのアンケートにお答えください。<br>http://bit.ly/g35OSo</p><p>・通知音が止まらない。<br>現在調査中です。テスト発報で止まらないようであれば、一度別の通知音に変更すると直る可能性があります。</p><p>・設定が初期化されるor保存されない。or何度も初期設定画面が表示される。<br>これはAndroid 2.2.1を搭載したGALAXY SなどのSamsung製端末側の不具合です。<br>なまず速報の問題ではありません。</p><p>・アップデート後、ホームのアイコンが×アイコンになる<br>一部のシャープ製端末に搭載されているホームアプリの問題です。<br>メニューの無効アイコン一括削除から削除してください。<br>http://namazu.twiple.jp/forum/viewtopic.php?id=82</p><p><br>・再起動時にサービスが起動しない。<br>app2sd、カスタムROMなどで外部メディアにインストールされているとサービスを自動起動することが出来ません。内部メモリにインストールしてください。</p><p>・通知条件以下の地震が通知される。<br>一度通知条件以上の地震速報の配信後、続報により地震の規模が下がった場合、表示内容も更新されますので通知条件以下の地震が通知されたように見える事があります。</p><p>----<br>このたびの震災の被害に遭われた方々にお見舞い申し上げます。<br>また、被害に遭われた皆さまが、一日も早く元の生活取り戻せるよう、心よりお祈り申し上げます。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.twiple.android.quake" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.twiple.android.quake" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.arlabsmobile.barometerfree" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.arlabsmobile.barometerfree" title="免费准确的晴雨表"> 341.    免费准确的晴雨表  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=AR+Labs" title="AR Labs">AR Labs</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.arlabsmobile.barometerfree"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS5hcmxhYnNtb2JpbGUuYmFyb21ldGVyZnJlZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Accurate Barometer!<p>这个晴雨表使用您的设备的压力传感器来显示被称为平均海平面真正的气压。 </p><p>每一个气象预报服务提出了被称为平均海平面气压，但如果你（和你的设备）不能在海平面？ </p><p>嗯，这个应用程序找到你的位置，确定您所在位置的海拔高度，所以它修正测得的压力来引用它来平均海平面。 </p><p>它还： <br>&nbsp; - 显示了在不同的气压单位的压力（百帕，毫巴，毫米汞柱，英寸汞柱） <br>&nbsp; - 保留了历史的措施，并给出了压力趋势 <br>&nbsp; - 给出了基于大气压力和压力趋势短时间内天气预报 </p><p>为了获得有效的天气预报，鼓励用户每天（甚至更频繁）来启动应用程序，以允许压力趋势的评价。 </p><p>警告： data-cover-large="https://lh4.ggpht.com/L3QdMyWndaKK-ZNVTemr7n60QVPriD014rJ-eUCygz4IvXoHMv9q7fxIyUSTlL3O1Uw=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh4.ggpht.com/L3QdMyWndaKK-ZNVTemr7n60QVPriD014rJ-eUCygz4IvXoHMv9q7fxIyUSTlL3O1Uw=w170-rw" <span class="preordered-label">已預購</span> </span> <span class="preview-overlay-container" data-docid="jp.kid.android.kweatherreport">  </span>  </a>  </div> <div class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.kid.android.kweatherreport" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.kid.android.kweatherreport" title="K天気予報（傘アラーム～今日、雨ふるの？～）"> 346.    K天気予報（傘アラーム～今日、雨ふるの？～）  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Mr.kid" title="Mr.kid">Mr.kid</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.kid.android.kweatherreport"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWpwLmtpZC5hbmRyb2lkLmt3ZWF0aGVycmVwb3J0EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  今日の天気はどうなってるのかな？　天気予報を簡単チェック！<br>傘（雨・雪）お知らせで、その日の傘チェックを！<p>== 更新内容( 2015/03/29)  ======================<br>・ロリポップ以上で、ステータスバーのアイコンが、白抜きになってしまう現象を修正(暫定)<br>・その他不具合修正<br>===========================================</p><p><br>== 機能 == <br>＜天気予報＞<br>設定した地域（メイン、サブ1、サブ2）の1週間分の天気予報をチェックできます。<br>現在時刻の気温、降水量、風速を確認できます。<br>今日分、昨日分のアメダスデータを確認できます。<br>警報、注意報を確認できます。<br>初期設定では、メイン地域は、「東京」が設定されています。<br>設定画面で、あなたの地域を設定してください。</p><p>現在位置周辺の天気予報を表示できます。<br>（表示地域は場所によっては微妙にずれてしまう可能性もありますけど、<br>そのへんはお許しください。）</p><p>～※現在位置の情報を取得する際の注意点※～<br>LTEの場合、ネットワークでの位置情報が取得しにくい時があるようです。<br>取得できない場合は、GPSを有効にしてください。<br>（屋内だと、位置情報が取得しにくい場合があります。）<br>（位置情報が取得しにくい場合、端末を再起動すると改善されることがあるようです）</p><p>☆コメント機能<br>簡易熱中症チェック、不快指数チェックなどなど、コメントを表示します。<br>※熱中症は、警戒レベル以上の場合、表示します。（簡易チェックなので、参考程度でお願いしますw<br>コメントは、キャラクタをタップするときりかわります。<br>天気以外のコメントも多々表示しますが・・・お遊び機能なので怒らないでくださいw</p><p>＜気象情報＞<br>全国の天気、気象衛星、アメダス（降水量）、レーザー・ナウキャスト（降水）、<br>解析雨量・降水短時間予報、紫外線予測、アメダス(温度)、アメダス(風)、レーダ(雷)、<br>台風、地震、花粉の情報が確認できます。<br>画像の長押しで、その画像を拡大表示、または保存（SDカードに）できます。</p><p>＜傘（雨、雪）アラーム＞<br>傘（雨、雪）のお知らせを設定すると、設定した時刻に天気をチェックして、<br>雨（もしくは雪）の場合、「傘が必要だよ」通知を行います。<br>通知音を出すか出さないか選択できます。<br>通知する曜日を指定できます。</p><p>＜ステータスバー＞<br>ステータスバー、通知領域に、今日の天気を常に表示できます。</p><p>＜ウィジェット＞<br>ホームにウィジェットを配置できます。<br>種類は5種類です。<br>・1x1（今日の天気用）<br>・4x1（週間天気(6日分)用）<br>・2x2(今日、明日の天気用)<br>・4x1(3時間ごとの天気用)<br>・4x2(週間+3時間ごとの天気用)</p><p>ウィジェットは、設定で色（10種類）、文字サイズを変更できます。<br>週間天気用のウィジェットは何日分（4日～7日）表示するか変更できます。</p><p>== ウィジェットの配置方法 ==<br>ウィジェットを表示するには、アプリが本体にインストールされている必要があります。<br>（SDカードにインストールしているとウィジェットの一覧に表示されないみたいです。）</p><p>そして、以下の操作でウィジェットを配置できます。</p><p>・ホーム画面を長押し。<br>・操作の選択で、ウィジェットを選択。<br>・K天気予報を選択する。</p><p>※ウィジェット配置方法の参考サイト。<br>http://andronavi.com/2011/05/91430</p><p><br>＜その他＞<br>設定画面で、アプリのテーマ色を変更できます。（色10種類）<br>設定画面で、天気予報部分の文字サイズを変更できます。</p><p>== 天気予報の情報元 ==</p><p>天気予報の情報は、以下から取得しています。<br>・Weather Map<br>http://www.weathermap.co.jp/</p><p>・気象庁<br>http://www.jma.go.jp/jma/index.html</p><p>花粉情報は<br>Yahoo!JAPANが提供する情報を表示しています。<br>http://weather.yahoo.co.jp/weather/<br>==レビュー==</p><p>以下サイトにレビューを掲載していただきました。<br>ありがとうございます。</p><p>インストールする際のご参考に、以下サイトもチェックしてみてください。(*^-^*)v</p><p>☆オクトバ<br>http://octoba.net/archives/20131021-android-app-ktenki-224990.html</p><p>☆マイナビ•ニュース<br>http://news.mynavi.jp/series/androidbiz/012/index.html</p><p>☆goo スマホ部<br>http://sp.oshiete.goo.ne.jp/app/review/253660</p><p>☆dマーケット アプリ＆レビュー<br>http://app.dcm-gate.com/app_review/00cd88a/</p><p>☆sony select<br>http://appnavi.sonyericsson.co.jp/pc/ag/index.php?page=pick&amp;id=2892</p><p>☆お仕事アプリ.com<br>http://www.oshigotoapps.com/android/k%E5%A4%A9%E6%B0%97%E4%BA%88%E5%A0%B1</p><p>☆アンドロイダー<br>https://androider.jp/official/app/0e0d2635aac82a23/</p><p><br>== class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=mobile.application.forfree.earth" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=mobile.application.forfree.earth" title="Earth Viewer"> 348.    Earth Viewer  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=H21+lab" title="H21 lab">H21 lab</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="mobile.application.forfree.earth"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKgooEiYKIG1vYmlsZS5hcHBsaWNhdGlvbi5mb3JmcmVlLmVhcnRoEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Animated planet Earth with live weather and satellite data.<br>Imagery included:<p>Climate Reanalyzer weather forecast<br>- World GFS Precipation and Clouds (+48h)<br>- World GFS Air Temperature (+48h)<br>- World GFS Air Temperature Anomaly (+48h)<br>- World GFS Precipitable Water (+48h)<br>- World GFS Surface Wind Speed (+48h)<br>- World GFS Jetstream Wind Speed (+48h)<br>- World GFS Snow Depth (+48h)</p><p>US Naval Research Laboratory, Marine Meteorology Division<br>- World Rainrate (-24h, generated every 3h)</p><p>METEOSAT 0 degree satellite<br>- Airmass realtime imagery (-24h, generated every 1h)<br>- Airmass realtime imagery full resolution (-6h, generated every 1h)<br>- Multi-Sensor Precipitation Estimate (rain rate) (-24h, generated every 15min)<br>- IR 10.8 (-24h, generated every 1h)</p><p>METEOSAT IODC satellite<br>- Multi-Sensor Precipitation Estimate (rain rate) (-24h, generated every 30min)</p><p>NASA GOES satellite<br>- Goes East Infrared (-24h, generated every 3h)<br>- Goes West Infrared (-24h, generated every 3h)</p><p>MTSAT satellite<br>- Infrared (-24h, generated every 1h)</p><p>SSEC<br>- Infrared low res global composite (-1w, generated every 3h)<br>- Water vapor low res global composite (-1w, generated every 3h)</p><p>Application features<br>- Interpolation between images<br>- Imagery selection from menu<br>- Live Sun light<br>- Bump mapping<br>- Data cache for offline use<br>- Double tap stop/play animation<br>- No Ads</p><p>Copyright and credit<br>CCI data has been obtained using Climate Reanalyzer (http://cci-reanalyzer.org), Climate Change Institute, University of Maine, USA.<br>NRL DATA has been obtained using United States Naval Research Laboratory, Marine Meteorology Division (http://www.nrlmry.navy.mil)<br>All METEOSAT images shown in the application are subject to EUMETSAT copyright.<br>For all NASA GOES images credit to NOAA-NASA GOES Project.<br>For all MTSAT images credit to Japan Meteorological Agency.<br>For all SSEC images provided courtesy of University of Wisconsin-Madison Space Science and Engineering Center.<br>For Xplanet cloudmap many thanks to Hari Nair author of Xplanet.</p><p>Limitations<br>On some devices application will not launch and crash report is seen. This is caused in most cases by low graphical card capabilities or low amount of memory of the target device. Application use OpenGL ES 2.0 and extensive pixel shader with multitexturing.</p><p>Time of CCI data is sometimes shifted back by one day. For exact time always the time in the texture is relevant. This limitation is caused mainly that it is not possible to get the date of the images from the cci-reanalyzer webpage without OCR and these images and not generated always at the same day time.</p><p>Application is distributed as local image viewer which is accessing public available content from internet on behalf of user. Data are internally cached and only delta is downloaded. There is no guarantee for the availability of the downloaded data and the application also works without internet connectivity. </p><p>Program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Will it get stormy?<br>WeatherMaps provides an easy answer to all these questions with a rain radar, satellite image and storm info on one map.</p><p>WeatherMaps offers you these advantages:<br>- Data updates every 15 minutes<br>- Loop 1 hour back and 1 hour forward<br>- 24 hour forecast<br>- Various zoom levels<br>- Location detection<br>- Automatic updates</p><p>WeatherMaps Premium is available if you want to zoom in even closer. <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=hirozo.net" title="hirozo.net">hirozo.net</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="net.hirozo.KiKNetViewPkg"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGG5ldC5oaXJvem8uS2lLTmV0Vmlld1BrZxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  独立行政法人防災科学技術研究所のサイトで見られる強震モニタを勝手にアプリにしてみました。<br>※サードパーティアプリです。作者は独立行政法人防災科学技術研究所さんの関係者ではありません。<br>URL等決め打ちにしてるところがあるため、サイトの仕様変更で見られなくなる可能性があります。<p>通知を新強震モニタの地震発生で送信するようにしました。<br>第1報で通知音あり、最終報で通知音なしで送信しています。</p><p>menuボタンによって設定／スクリーンショット／画像共有が行なえます。<br>設定できる項目は、<br>・スリープ無効設定<br>・通知有効／無効設定<br>・背景地図、白／黒選択<br>・縦画面時及び横画面時左側マップの種類設定<br>・横画面時右側マップの種類設定<br>・強震モニタサイトデータ取得オフセット時間<br>　※サーバーの処理が重くなって白地図が頻繁に表示される場合に調整して見て下さい（例：-4秒 ー＞ -6秒）<br>・強震モニタサーバーの選択</p><p>縦画面表示時に以下の操作が可能です。<br>・左下のスライドバーにて、過去１時間までのデータを表示<br>・スライドバー左右のボタンにて、前後１秒(従来モニタは２秒)のデータへ移動（またボタン長押しで連続的に変化できます）<br>・過去データ表示時に右下のボタン押下で最新データ表示へ復帰</p><p>また、縦横両画面においてスワイプによってマップ種別を切り替えることができます。<br>スクリーンショットは、外部ストレージ（SDカード）の /data/net.hirozo.KiKNetViewPkg/ 以下に保存されます。 </p><p>http://www.kyoshin.bosai.go.jp/kyoshin/<br>本家強震モニタサイトにて以下のお知らせが出ています。<br>「2012年12月25日に地表観測点でのデータを追加しました。<br>この更新後、特に関東地方で以前と比べて大きい値の表示が目立ちますが、 観測点が増えたためであり、実際の観測値を表示したものとなります。 」</p><p>※強震モニタのデータ利用に関しては、強震モニタHPの”データ等の利用上の注意”に則って運用しています。<br>以下全文、http://www.kyoshin.bosai.go.jp/kyoshin/ より<br>「データ等の利用上の注意<br>K-NET, KiK-netのデータ・情報は利用者を不特定として，制限なく使用することができます．ただし，K-NET, KiK-netをより良いものとするため，次の2点を必ずお守りいただくようお願い致します．<br>(1) K-NET, KiK-netのデータ・情報を利用した時は，防災科学技術研究所が運用しているK-NET・KiK-netの情報を利用したことを謝辞等に明示して下さい．<br>(2) K-NET, KiK-netのデータ・情報を用いて作成された学術論文・報告書等で，印刷物が出版・作成された場合は，コピーを下記に送って下さい．これには、学会講演の予稿集・商用利用時の報告書等も含まれます．お送りいただくのは、年度末にまとめてお送りいただいても，随時お送りいただいても構いません．<br>〒305-0006 茨城県つくば市天王台3-1<br>独立行政法人 防災科学技術研究所<br>地震・火山観測データセンター 強震観測管理室<br>(注) 以上のお願いは，データの利用されている実績を蓄積することによってデータ提供の必要性・有益性を把握し，サービスの継続と向上を図るために不可欠であることを御理解下さい．」</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span   World Weather Clock Widget  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=satok" title="satok">satok</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="org.satok.gweather"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEm9yZy5zYXRvay5nd2VhdGhlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Check weather forecasts and current conditions, time and date for any location. href="/store/apps/details?id=org.emsc_csem.lastquake" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.emsc_csem.lastquake" title="LastQuake - EMSC Earthquakes"> 360.    LastQuake - EMSC Earthquakes  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=EMSC-CSEM" title="EMSC-CSEM">EMSC-CSEM</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="org.emsc_csem.lastquake"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF29yZy5lbXNjX2NzZW0ubGFzdHF1YWtlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ** WHY CHOOSE THIS APP? **<br>LastQuake is the Euro-Mediterranean Seismological Center (EMSC) official earthquakes app. This app is designed by seismologists for the general public, earthquake witnesses and the scientific community. <br>There are only about 1000 earthquakes of interest to the public each year but this is a tiny fraction of the total, 97% of the earthquakes around the world are detected only by instruments. Using direct access to the results of the EMSC seismic rapid detection tools, LastQuake presents primarily these significant earthquakes.<br>--<br>** WHAT IS THE EMSC? **<br>The EMSC is a non-profit scientific organization created in 1975 which federates 84 seismological institutes from 55 different countries. It offers rapid earthquake information to the public and international organizations.<br>The EMSC aims to reach the eyewitnesses and encourage them to fill in their earthquake questionnaire and send in relevant photos. These are added to publicly shared data about each event and help to assess earthquakes’ impacts.<br>--<br>** MAIN FEATURES **<br>* Real time data <br>* “Significant” earthquakes list (earthquakes known to be felt as detected by the EMSC seismic rapid detection tools)<br>* “Near Me” earthquakes list (customizable)<br>* “All” earthquakes list (full list of the earthquakes around the world published by EMSC)<br>* PTWC Tsunami Info and Tsunami Watch displayed in the lists when applicable (by tsunami icon)<br>* Colors allow seeing at a glance the effects of an earthquake (8 levels including 2 for tsunamigenic earthquakes)<br>* Customizable date formats (UTC, time at the epicenter or time in your device)<br>* Customizable push notifications (destructive earthquakes, “around me” earthquakes)<br>* Details about each earthquake: depth, localization, main closest cities, population<br>* Social media sharing via all the social apps installed in your device<br>* See comments and pictures by witnesses<br>* EMSC map, street map, aerial map for each earthquake (zoom in/zoom out)<br>* Map of the seismicity in the region for each earthquake (data from the exclusive EMSC database)<br>* Global map of the earthquakes around the world<br>*===&gt; FOR PEOPLE EXPERIENCING AN EARTHQUAKE &lt;===<br>-- Fill in the rapid questionnaire to help seismologists: instant assessment of the earthquake by clicking an illustration<br>-- Your comment and/or picture published at the same time on the EMSC website and in your Twitter / Facebook <br>* No ads!<br>* LastQuake supports two languages: English and French<br>--<br>EMSC is a NGO. If you wish to support our organization, you will able to buy the paid version of the app available soon in this store. If you can help to translate this app in the following languages, please contact us:<br>-- Spanish<br>-- Italian<br>-- Greek<br>-- Turkish <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.emsc_csem.lastquake" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a WeatherSignal  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=OpenSignal.com" title="OpenSignal.com">OpenSignal.com</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.opensignal.weathersignal"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJgokEiIKHGNvbS5vcGVuc2lnbmFsLndlYXRoZXJzaWduYWwQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  WeatherSignal uses native phone sensors to measure local atmospheric conditions, which are then displayed on our live-updating weather map. Join the world's largest crowdsourced weather project.<br>  <br>Features:<br>✓ Readout for all the sensors on your device (think Tricorder - but real!)<br>✓ Widgets for temperature, magnetic, light, humidity and pressure sensors (if you have them)<br>✓ Save all data to CSV - play with it however you like<br>✓ Map of readings of other users and of your own, see averages within each map window, click on icons to see full readout<br>✓ Manual reports<br>✓ Tons of graphs (for geeks like us :))<br>✓ Contribute to our maps (you can turn off sharing in settings) <br>✓ Share data to help us improve the weather forecast<br>✓ Looks great on tablets<p>Turn your device into a thermometer, barometer, lightmeter and hygrometer - depending on which sensors your device has - with this app your phone is  a mobile science kit!</p><p>What if my phone doesn't have many sensors?<br>We've teamed up with Hex3.co to provide support for their StormTag and StormTag+. These bring pressure, temperature, humidity &amp; UV sensors into a package that attaches to your keyring, never needs charging and sends data via Bluetooth LE. Get one now - from $20 on Kickstarter :) http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jonatherton/stormtag-a-bluetooth-weather-station-on-your-keyri</p><p>Get the beta:<br>https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/100212178184385927394<br>  <br>By using WeatherSignal you become part of the world's most ambitious weather crowdsourcing project – helping to record weather patterns on a more localised level than ever before. We are working with numerous meteorological institutions, including the Univ. of Washington, Birmingham Univ. and the UK Met Office. Your readings help us improve weather forecasting for everyone! </p><p>Featured in the New Scientist and Scientific American! http://bit.ly/1aFY3Ls</p><p>*Thermometer readings are experimental!*</p><p>*** This app is experimental! Individual TEMPERATURE readings may be incorrect, but when averaged over many users we get reliable information for our community powered maps. ***</p><p>The app works best on the Galaxy S4 since it has the most sensors. Get a StormTag to add sensors to your phone.</p><p>The WeatherSignal app can measure:<br>✓ Pressure (certain devices only)<br>✓ Temperature (see note)<br>✓ Light Intensity <br>✓ Humidity (Galaxy S4 only) <br>✓ Magnetic Flux <br>✓ Acceleration (turn on in application settings)</p><p>This app features Google's Activity Recognition: monitor when you're walking, in vehicle, on a bicycle. Save the results to CSV and perform your own analysis/create maps, for example for quantified self.<br> <br>*** TEMPERATURE ***</p><p>We’ve come up with an algorithm that translates battery temperature into ambient temperature – making your phone a thermometer. For each user this is approximate but there is a very strong correlation between battery and ambient temperature when spread over a crowd of users. If you are using a cell phone without an external thermometer then the temperature reading you’ll see is a battery temperature reading converted through our algorithm. Often the algorithm will get it wrong, but we've shown that with appropriate averaging and filtering, these readings correlate extremely well with external ambient air temperature.</p><p>The Galaxy S4, which has an ambient air temperature thermometer, may produce incorrect readings if the phone is hot due to use.</p><p>*** PRESSURE ****</p><p>Devices that contain barometers include:</p><p>Galaxy Nexus<br>Galaxy S3, S4, Note (1,2,3)<br>Nexus 4<br>Nexus 10<br>Xoom<br>RAZR MAXX HD<br>Xiaomi MI-2</p><p>Units available:<br>millibars/hPa inches of mercury aka Hg or inches H<br>centigrade/celsius and Fahrenheit</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Unlike regular programs they don't just install themselves in the application tray so you have to add them manually. They will not open or launch.<br>Here's how to add a widget on your Android home screen.</p><p>STEPS HOW TO ADD A WIDGET<br>==========================<br>1.On your Android home screen, tap any blank or “empty” area with size 4x1 and hold down your finger.<br>2.An “Add to Home screen” window will pop up. From that window, tap “Widgets”.<br>3.You’ll be presented with a list of all the installed Widgets on your Android device.<br>4.Select the clock to add to your home screen by tapping it.</p><p>Notes<br>=====<br>"Time frozen/not updating"-&gt; taskiller killed the clock(exclude it from taskillers)<br>When phone starts, clock starts in less than a min too.</p><p>ROM users-&gt; make sure the clock is NOT moved on SD card.<br>Widgets are not supposed to be on SD card. Move it back to the phone storage.</p><p>Weather hint: For world destinations with two words in the name, type in the box the words with a plus sign.<br>For example "Buenos Aires" type "Buenos+Aires",remember the "+" sign -no spaces, don't include the quotes.</p><p>Email problems/suggestions<br>Check our website for more help.</p><p>EXCLUDE IT FROM TASKILLERS!!!<br>Be polite, this is a free app :-)</p><p>VIDEO HOW TO ADD WIDGETS<br>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpMLF9b2aTQ</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span forecast<p>Sense cross Analog Dark style clock,size 4x2</p><p>It features:<br>============<br>★ 212 skins to choose from<br>★ 12 or 24 hour mode<br>★ Portrait or Landscape mode<br>★ Color choice for all information displayed on the widget<br>★ System Information on the widget front or as a pop-up window<br>★ Shows battery level on the widget<br>★ Shows Moon phase on the widget thats is calculated automatically each day.<br>★ Current Weather conditions which include:<br>+Current temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius<br>+Feels like Temperature<br>+Humidity<br>+Wind speed in Km or miles per hour<br>★ 2 Weather layouts on clock widget(user selected from configuration screen)<br>★ 2 Forecast layouts(user selected from configuration screen)<br>★ 4 Day weather forecast that includes for each day:<br>+High and Low temperature<br>+Precipitation percentage<br>+Weather description<br>★ Sunrise/Sunset times in either Forecast screens<br>★ 37 unique weather condition icons<br>★ Widget hotspots for interaction<br>+tap bottom right widget corner-&gt;return to configuration screen<br>+tap bottom left widget corner-&gt;popup system information window<br>+tap weather icon-&gt;launch forecast screen<br>+tap Hours tab-&gt;launch anything!(user selected from configuration screen)<br>+tap Minutes tab-&gt;launch anything!(user selected from configuration screen)</p><p><br>STEPS HOW TO ADD A WIDGET<br>==========================<br>1.On your Android home screen, tap any blank or “empty” area with size 4x2 and hold down your finger.<br>2.An “Add to Home screen” window will pop up. From that window, tap “Widgets”.<br>3.You’ll be presented with a list of all the installed Widgets on your Android device.<br>4.Select the "3D Digital Weather Clock” to add to your home screen by tapping it.</p><p>ICS -How to add widgets<br>=======================<br>On ICS ,you can find the widget in the application drawer,<br>under the tab widgets.<br>Drag and drop the widget on a screen with empty<br>space of 4x2.<br>If not, restart your phone, and the widget will be in the application drawer,under the tab widgets.<br>Drag and drop the widget on a screen with empty<br>space of 4x2.</p><p>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1XjnPGOdYG8</p><p><br>Notes<br>=====<br>- "Time frozen/not updating"-&gt; taskiller killed the clock(exclude it from taskillers)<br>- When phone starts, clock starts in less than a min too.<br>- "Cannot find/Cannot Open/Cannot Launch"-&gt; read instructions above how to add widgets on your home screen, or step by step instructions in your application drawer.</p><p>ROM users-&gt; make sure the clock is NOT moved on SD card.<br>Widgets are not supposed to be on SD card. Move it back to the phone storage.</p><p>Weather hint: For world destinations with two words in the name, type in the box the words with a plus sign.<br>For example "Buenos Aires" type "Buenos+Aires",remember the "+" sign -no spaces, don't include the quotes.</p><p>Email problems/suggestions<br>Check our website for more help.</p><p>EXCLUDE IT FROM TASKILLERS!!!<br>Be polite, this Sense Analog Small Black 4x1  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Factory+Widgets" title="Factory Widgets">Factory Widgets</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="factory.widgets.SenseAnalogThinBlack"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLgosEioKJGZhY3Rvcnkud2lkZ2V0cy5TZW5zZUFuYWxvZ1RoaW5CbGFjaxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Digital weather and system info clock widget with size 4x1<p>It features:</p><p>12/24 hr + Color options on all info displayed<br>System Stats Info<br>High resolution weather icons<br>Option for minutes color to be the same as hours<br>Option for alternative forecast layout<br>Weather &amp; Forecast (International)<br>Two weather forecast layouts</p><p>Interaction:<br>+tap center-&gt;preferences<br>+tap weather icon-&gt;forecast<br>+tap Hours-&gt;launch anything!<br>+tap Minutes-&gt;launch anything!<br>+tap the moon icon in weather forecast screens <br>  for detailed views on moon-phases for the current day, current month and the years half and full phases.</p><p>Widgets on Android work a bit differently than a normal application. Unlike regular programs they don't just install themselves in the application tray so you have to add them manually. They will not open or launch.<br>Here's how to add a widget on your Android home screen.</p><p>STEPS HOW TO ADD A WIDGET<br>==========================<br>1.On your Android home screen, tap any blank or “empty” area with size 4x1 and hold down your finger.<br>2.An “Add to Home screen” window will pop up. From that window, tap “Widgets”.<br>3.You’ll be presented with a list of all the installed Widgets on your Android device.<br>4.Select the clock to add to your home screen by tapping it.</p><p>Notes<br>=====<br>"Time frozen/not updating"-&gt; taskiller killed the clock(exclude it from taskillers)<br>When phone starts, clock starts in less than a min too.</p><p>ROM users-&gt; make sure the clock is NOT moved on SD card.<br>Widgets are not supposed to be on SD card. Move it back to the phone storage.</p><p>Weather hint: For world destinations with two words in the name, type in the box the words with a plus sign.<br>For example "Buenos Aires" type "Buenos+Aires",remember the "+" sign -no spaces, don't include the quotes.</p><p>Email problems/suggestions<br>Check our website for more help.</p><p>EXCLUDE IT FROM TASKILLERS!!!<br>Be polite, this is a free app :-)</p><p>VIDEO HOW TO ADD WIDGETS<br>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpMLF9b2aTQ</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span wetter.info  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Deutsche+Telekom+AG" title="Deutsche Telekom AG">Deutsche Telekom AG</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.telekom.wetterinfo"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS50ZWxla29tLndldHRlcmluZm8QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  wetter.info – genau mein Wetter<p>Mit der kostenlosen wetter.info App jederzeit und überall über das aktuelle Wetter und die Wetteraussichten von 1,5 Mio. Orten weltweit informiert sein. </p><p>Die Wetter-Highlights auf einen Blick:</p><p>•  Das aktuelle Wetter von über 84.000 Orten in Deutschland und 1,5 Mio. Orten weltweit<br>• 10-Tage-Vorhersage für alle Orte<br>• Präzise Wetterprognose durch den Zugriff auf ca. 14.000 Wetterstationen weltweit<br>• Wetterkarten von über 180 Ländern weltweit für das Wetter von heute und die Wetteraussichten von morgen und übermorgen<br>• Unwetterwarnungen für Deutschland und 16 weitere Länder in Europa (u.a. Italien, Spanien und Frankreich) <br>•  Niederschlagsradar – das Regenradar inklusive Schnee, Graupel und Hagel<br>•  Wetter Widgets in den Größen 2:1, 4:1, 4:2 und 5:2 in verschiedenen Designs<br>•  Wettervideos - tägliche aktualisierte Expertenvideos von Meteorologen mit Wetterberichten über die aktuelle Wetterlage und die neusten Wetterprognosen</p><p>Neu seit Version 1.6.6.: <br>• neues Widget in der Größe 5:2 für große Smartphones und Tablets </p><p>Schon 2,5 Millionen Mal wurde die wetter.info-App für Smartphones heruntergeladen - damit gehört sie zu den beliebtesten und meistgeladenen Apps auf dem deutschen Markt. <br>Ob Tagesvorhersage, Wettervorschau, Wetterwarnungen oder Regenradar – die Wetter App bietet alle relevanten Wetterinformationen  mit der gewohnten Genauigkeit von wetter.info!</p><p>Sie haben die Möglichkeit, bis zu 15 Favoriten einzustellen und Details über Temperaturen, Windrichtung, Windgeschwindigkeit, Wetterentwicklung, Niederschlagswahrscheinlichkeit und –menge zu erfahren. </p><p>Durch unsere ca. 14.000 Wetterstationen weltweit können wir Ihnen darüber hinaus die aktuelle Wetterlage inklusive Wetterprognose aus über 180 Ländern anzeigen.</p><p>Regenschirm oder Sonnenbrille? Nie mehr von Regen oder Unwetter überrascht werden: Das zoombare Regenradar zeigt Ihnen an, wo es in den vergangenen 90 Minuten geregnet hat, wann es bei Ihnen regnen wird und ob es sich um einen Schauer oder ein großes Regengebiet handelt. Liegt eine Unwetterwarnung für einen Ihrer Favoriten vor, werden Sie durch eine Vorwarnung rechtzeitig informiert.</p><p>Täglich neue Wettervideos - In mehrmals täglich aktualisierten Videos berichtet das Moderatorenteam über spezielle Wetterereignisse wie etwa Unwetterwarnungen, Kältewellen oder Rekordtemperaturen. </p><p>Die wetter.info App bietet Ihnen die Möglichkeit verschiedene Widgets auf Ihrem Homescreen zu platzieren, um das aktuelle Wetter und die Temperatur Ihres Lieblingsorts immer im Blick zu haben.</p><p>Egal ob sie Ihren Urlaub, das Wochenende oder den nächsten Outdoor-Ausflug planen wollen, mit der Wetter App von wetter.info sind Sie immer erstklassig und zuverlässig über die Wetterlage und die Wettertrends informiert.</p><p>Besuchen Sie uns auch auf unserer Webseite www.wetter.info oder auf unserer Facebook-Seite https://de-de.facebook.com/wetter.info. </p><p>Haben Sie Fragen, Anmerkungen oder Wünsche? Dann schicken Sie uns gerne eine Email an info@wetter.info. Auf diesem Weg können wir Ihnen weiterhelfen und eine ausführliche Antwort geben. Wir freuen uns auch über Bewertungen hier im Play Store.</p><p>Vielen Dank!</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span  Sunnycomb天氣  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Weathernews+Inc." title="Weathernews Inc.">Weathernews Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.weathernews.sunnycomb"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS53ZWF0aGVybmV3cy5zdW5ueWNvbWIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  日本最受歡迎的天氣app在全球擴大上線了！Sunnycomb是一個社交型天氣app,除了一般的天氣預報外,也藉由數千名使用者的體感交流,為您量身打造屬於自己的天氣預報。<p>Sunnycomb除了像傳統的天氣app,可以為您提供氣溫,天氣狀況,日出和日落的時間之外,還提供了一個社群,讓使用者們相互交流彼此的經驗感受,並依照當地的天氣狀況提供生活上有用的資訊。</p><p>Sunnycomb擁有下列幾項令人注目的功能：<br>天氣預報：透過新穎的介面,並由自動定位功能,顯示出所在地的氣溫（攝氏或華氏）,天氣狀況,濕度及其他天氣相關的資訊。<br>生活照片：可以查看世界上所有使用者所分享的天空照片,感受當地的實況,進一步的把握您所在地,或是即將前往旅行的目的地的天氣狀況。<br>心情分享：透過當地使用者的心情分享,可以更具體的感受到當地真實的天氣狀況。<br>私人的天氣檔案：記錄屬於您專有的天氣檔案,並可以將它傳送到雲端保存<br>社交特點：可以關注及評論,並分享/交流您所感興趣的天氣記錄。</p><p>Sunnycomb改變傳統式的天氣預報,用一種前所未有的方式,來追蹤風暴,查看氣溫,並標記您所在地的天氣。<br>Sunnycomb將天氣數據,科學分析以及個人的天氣記錄,全方位的結合了起來。</p><p>全球有約70億的人口,但我們分享着同一個天空！</p><p><br>您可以在您個人檔案的頁面更改溫度的單位設定(°C / °F)。點擊右上角的圖示,進入"編輯個人檔案"即可。﻿</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.weathernews.sunnycomb" Thermometer  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Fabian+Bossler" title="Fabian Bossler">Fabian class="description">  This App measures the temperature (in °C) and humidity with sensors in the device.<p>In addition you can choose between 5 different backgrounds.</p><p>“Thermometer” is free, doesn’t need any permission and is without advertisement.</p><p></p><p><br>  ATTENTION:</p><p>- If you touch the device physically the results can vary.</p><p>- Put the device out of your hand and don’t put it into the direct sun to get the most exactly measuring results.</p><p>- You can’t use “Thermometer” on devices without temperature- and humidity sensors.</p><p></p><p></p><p>  The following devices for example are supplied:</p><p>- Samsung Galaxy S4 (not Samsung Galaxy S4 mini)</p><p>- Samsung Galaxy Note 3</p><p>- Samsung Galaxy S5</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Zephyrus Wind Speed Meter  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Gaia+Consulting" title="Gaia Consulting">Gaia Consulting</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="b4a.zephyr"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFAoSEhAKCmI0YS56ZXBoeXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This application brings the functionalities of an Anemometer (max 20 m/s)  to your phone.<p>Dynamic and Average wind speed measuring modes with real time charts, wind direction display (compass).</p><p>Suitable for any winter and summer windsport!</p><p><br>&gt;&gt;Quick start<br>The application relies on the mobile microphone signal. To achieve the best results consider the following:<br>1)  Easy calibration (only the first time): Some mobiles are automatically calibrated in the first installation phase. For details see the calibration section of the user manual<br>2) avoid measurement in presence of loud noises (heavy traffic,motorbikes, trucks, loud talking,shots)<br>3) keep your fingers away from the mobile microphone (hold it by the top) and keep it in vertical position<br>4) orient the back of the phone in the direction of the wind (keeping the display in front of you)<br>5) click on one of the function buttons</p><p><br>&gt;&gt;Troubleshooting<br>1) Wrong calibration: You must set the Noise level: see the User's Guide calibration section.<br>2) Attenuation on mobile mic: your measurements never reach the thereshold blue line. Restart android.<br>3) The application is sensible to low level talking (at a distance &gt; 50 cm from the mic): go in the settings menu and disable ACG (check on). <br>4)  No signals detected below 1 m/s or over 20 m/s: the smart phone microphones do not work under/over a specific pressure. </p><p>Read the embedded User Guide: for any info or troubleshooting you can contact us at support@gaiacons.com.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=b4a.zephyr" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> 411.    Barometer Altimeter DashClock  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=baggus" title="baggus">baggus</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="pl.baggus.barometr"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEnBsLmJhZ2d1cy5iYXJvbWV0chABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Make use of the built-in sensors of your device!<p>Features:</p><p>- Barometer, Altimeter and Hygrometer<br>-  Fully customizable (Now you can change colors of almost everything)<br>-  Charts<br>- Widget with trends<br>- DashClock support<br>-  Uses built-in sensors<br>-  Multiple units supported (Pressure - hPa, mmHg. inHg, mbar, atm. Altitude - meters, feet)<br>-  Internet connection is required only for providing  better accuracy of the altimeter (but only downloads data when you want to - there is no background data usage)<br>-  Data exporting to a .csv file (supported by MS Excel etc.)<br>- Calibration<br>-  NO ADS</p><p>Some usage tips:</p><p>- QNH can be changed using volume buttons (short click, long click)</p><p>- Go to altimeter settings, locate and set nearest airport. It provides more accuracy of the altimeter.</p><p>- DashClock users – DC refreshes itself about once an hour. After installing the Barometer app, enabling pressure tracking and adding barometer to a DC widget, please wait a while(up to an hour) until it starts displaying correct pressure (instead of ‘000’). Pressure tracking service of the Barometer app does not start immediately. It is synced with other services running on Your device to preserve battery.  </p><p> - Widgets (normal, not DashClock Extension) refresh with a frequency set by Pressure Tracking Interval (in app settings). It is possible to refresh widgets manually without enabled pressure tracking option (but without displaying trends). To do so, please set widget click action to 'Refresh widget'.</p><p>- If you want to have a fully transparent widget background - slide the opacity bar to the far left (it doesn't matter what color it is)</p><p>- If you calibrate your barometer to show reduced pressure - disable the 'Use barometer calibration' option in Altimeter Settings.</p><p>Supported languages – English, Polish, Dutch Spanish and Germn. If you want to add more translations – please feel free to contact me. </p><p>For those who don't see this app in GooglePlay on their devices(CM users - I'm talking to you). href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sailgrib" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sailgrib" title="Marine Weather | SailGrib Free"> 413.    Marine Weather | SailGrib Free  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=SailGrib" title="SailGrib">SailGrib</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.sailgrib"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDGNvbS5zYWlsZ3JpYhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  YACHTING WORLD - "IMPRESSIVE" - July 2014<br>CRUISING WORLD -  APP OF THE MONTH - February 2013<p>Sailing weather and tides forecast maps designed for and by sailors.</p><p>With SailGrib, enjoy viewing weather and tide forecast on your Android device. <br>Select the map that you want to get data for<br>- request the grib file, download it and view its data on SailGrib.<br>- tide calculations are done directly on your device, no need for an internet connexion</p><p><br>The area selection is very simple as SailGrib uses maps.<br>The data request is done through SailGrib, Saildocs,Great Circle. SailGrib gets grib files by direct download or through an email exchange.</p><p>Features<br>- choose a map and overlay weather forecast data,<br>- download data using the best Grib files providers : SailGrib, Great Circle, Saildocs, MeteoConsult,...<br>- specify the request to your needs,<br>- request can be adjusted to match a maximum file size<br>- can be used with satellite phone email services like XGate with optimizer, the Iiridium Go or the AxcessPoint.<br>- offlline maps capability combined with satellite mail allows usage at sea.<br>- view weather overlays together on the same map</p><p>With SailGrib, you can download and view the following data:<br>- Wind (10m above sea level)<br>- Pressure (reduced to mean sea level)<br>- Precipitation (accumulated over 6 hours)<br>- Total cloud cover<br>- Air Temperature ( 2m above ground)<br>- Wave (significant wave height, mean wave direction and period)<br>- CAPE<br>- Tidal or oceanic currents</p><p>With SailGrib, you can specify the following parameters for your grib file request:<br>- grib provider : SailGrib, Great Circle, SailDocs, MeteoConsult, GMN, ....<br>- request method : direct download (SailGrib, Great Circle, MeteoConsult, GMN) or email (Great Circle and SailDocs)<br>- grid resolution: from very high resolution to 2.5°<br>- time step between forecasts :from 1 hour to 12 hours depending on models<br>- number of days for the forecast: from 1 to 14 depending on model<br>- maximum file size. SailGrib estimates the size of the grib file you request and adjust the grid resolution and the time step to make sure your file will size be lower than your set limit.</p><p>With SailGrib, you can view the following data:<br>- Windbarbs<br>- Isobars<br>- Precipitation maps<br>- Cloud cover maps<br>- Temperature maps<br>- Waves maps and arrows<br>- CAPE map<br>- Currents</p><p>Tide forecast are not official and are for reference purpose only.<br>Grib files are computer-generated forecast files which are sent without review, and are offered on an as-is basis. There is no assurance that the data is accurate or correct. By using these data you agree to these limitations and assume all the responsibility for their use.</p><p>In february 2013, SailGrib was elected App of the month by the magazine Cruising World.<br>http://thesailingcompany.com/app/app-of-the-month-sailgrib</p><p>SailGrib uses the JGRIB Java GRIB decoder (jgrib.sourceforge.net) and OpenStreetMap (www.openstreetmap.org).</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sailgrib" Das Wetter in Deutschland  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=surfcheck.info" title="surfcheck.info">surfcheck.info</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.wetter.in.de"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGgoYEhYKEGNvbS53ZXR0ZXIuaW4uZGUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Stay up to date with the current weather conditions in Germany - and in the world via the Weather station widget.<p>Das Wetter in Deutschland now contains more than 27 maps, forecasts and other items!</p><p>- Forecasts for today, this evening and tomorrow<br>- Satellite images (visible light + infra red)<br>- Detailed Wetterlage and text-forecast<br>- Maps showing the current temperatures and wind speed.<br>- UV prediction for today and tomorrow<br>- Animated weather map (several days in advance)<br>- Weather alarm + Coastal alarm<br>- Precipitation radar<br>- Rotate your device to view full screen<br>- Four app widgets bring live weather information to your home screen, including weather station widget working world wide!</p><p>Data is downloaded from the German national meteorological institute DWD. Due to the nature of this source, some content is written in German.</p><p>&gt; widgets only work when you run the app from phone memory, move to SD card will disable it.</p><p>Disclaimer:<br>We do our utmost to deliver you the best software and data available in the market, but of course we cannot guarantee the proper functioning or accuracy of both. class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=ca.cumulonimbus.barometernetwork" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=ca.cumulonimbus.barometernetwork" title="PressureNet"> 422.    PressureNet  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Cumulonimbus" title="Cumulonimbus">Cumulonimbus</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="ca.cumulonimbus.barometernetwork"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKgooEiYKIGNhLmN1bXVsb25pbWJ1cy5iYXJvbWV0ZXJuZXR3b3JrEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  By downloading PressureNet you are a citizen scientist helping make weather forecasts more accurate! <p><br>PressureNet is a network of crowdsourced weather sensors. We automatically collect atmospheric pressure measurements using barometers in new Android devices. We're sharing this data with scientists and researchers to improve weather forecasting. </p><p>PressureNet has been featured on BBC World Service, Wired Science, and MIT Technology Review:</p><p>BBC World Service: http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p014ypyj<br>Wired Science: http://www.wired.com/wiredscience/2013/01/android-weather-prediction/<br>MIT Technology Review: http://www.technologyreview.com/news/510626/app-feeds-scientists-atmospheric-data-from-thousands-of-smartphones/</p><p><br>Soon we'll provide you with a weather forecast based on your data! These forecasts should be significantly more accurate since the data is collected using smartphones - we can gather way more data about the atmosphere than ever before.</p><p><br>Until we make forecasts, we specialize in current weather conditions. Most apps show you the current weather at the airport, which isn't always relevant to you. PressureNet users alert each other of the weather, allowing us to build comprehensive maps of changing weather conditions on very local, relevant scales.</p><p><br>PressureNet supports all devices running Android 3.0+, though only tablets or phones with barometers will be able to contribute readings, see their pressure and use the widget.</p><p>Devices with barometers include:</p><p>Galaxy S3, S4, S5, S6<br>Galaxy Nexus<br>Galaxy Note, 2, 3, 4<br>Nexus 4, 5, 6, 10<br>Xoom<br>RAZR MAXX HD<br>Xiaomi MI-2, MI-3<br>Droid Ultra<br>Moto X<br>HTC One (M8)<br>..and others!</p><p><br>Features:</p><p>- NEW: Watch your contribution statistics rise as you help science</p><p>- Widget to submit current weather conditions (for map and animations)</p><p>- Animations of current weather conditions based on your submitted data!</p><p>- Interactive Google Map now includes weather graphics indicating current weather conditions, as submitted by you!</p><p>- Pressure drop/rise alerts: notifies you when your pressure starts to fall (indicating clouds/rain is coming) or rise (indicating good weather coming)</p><p>- Report the current conditions outside where you are - your data will show up on the map, in animations, and will help us validate our forecasts.</p><p>- My Data feature that shows your recent measurements graph and listing</p><p>- Export data you've submitted to a CSV file</p><p>- Settings to modify Auto-Submit options, change unit preferences, sharing preferences</p><p>- Widget to view your current barometer reading, submit readings, view pressure tendency</p><p>- Search for locations to quickly view pressure trends all over the world</p><p>This project is fully open source to foster innovation. The core PressureNet code is contained in our SDK so that app developers can easily integrate PressureNet inside their own apps. Check it out and email us if you have questions! PressureNet code on GitHub:</p><p><br>https://github.com/CbSoftware/PressureNet<br>https://github.com/CbSoftware/PressureNet-SDK<br>https://github.com/CbSoftware/PressureNet-server</p><p>We're always adding more features and would love your input. Visit our site at http://pressurenet.io or email us at software@cumulonimbus.ca</p><p>Keywords: PressureNet, pressure net, crowdsourcing, weather, barometer, sensor, hygrometer, forecast, barometer network</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span AccuWeather is an engaging, fully-featured, interactive weather application with an easy-to-use and playful interface. This truly is a one-of-a-kind application that will appeal to television viewers and tablet users alike. With GPS technology and interactive Google™ maps, the application makes it possible for you to get detailed and up-to-date weather forecasts and news on your television or tablet from the most trusted brand in weather.  <br> <br>Weather impacts everyone. From planning day-to-day activities to making future business or personal plans, you need fast, easy access to weather information from a reliable source. AccuWeather has all of the features and information that you need, is free of charge and will safeguard your daily and future plans from weather interruptions.</p><p>Weather Information:</p><p>• Accurate and local forecasts for locations worldwide. Updated every hour, forecasts include the most detailed hourly forecasts for the next twenty-four hours, plus day and night weather forecasts and information for the next fifteen days – all available in 27 languages.</p><p>• Current weather conditions are displayed with location name and time, temperature, humidity percentages, visibility, pressure, dew point, precipitation and amounts, UV index, and AM and PM times for sunrise and sunset.</p><p>• The day and night weather forecasts for the next fifteen days also include, humidity percentages, precipitation and amounts, wind and wind gust speed, wind direction, and the exclusive, patented, RealFeel® temperature – AccuWeather’s proprietary weather forecasting system that takes into account multiple weather conditions to determine how the local temperature actually feels, which may be warmer or colder than the temperature depending on these conditions. </p><p>• WeatherAlarms for locations worldwide, for weather events including, snow, ice, rain, wind, and thunderstorms. </p><p>• Weather display options, including animated radar for North America, satellite and interactive Google™ maps for locations worldwide, and current, broadcast-quality weather videos.</p><p>• Special lifestyle weather and health forecasts, as well as conditions for specific outdoor activities and sports, such as golfing, fishing, and jogging, and health-related weather forecasts, such as the hour-by-hour UV forecast, flu forecast, migraine headache forecast, and arthritis forecast. </p><p>Application Features: </p><p>• Stores as many locations as the user chooses, with simple toggling between locations.</p><p>• Navigation bar with easy-to-use buttons for toggling between each screen. Screens include Current, Hourly, Forecast, Maps, Lifestyle, News, and Settings. </p><p>• The 24 hours of hourly data is available in a list format that scrolls when selected.</p><p>• The user may choose between metric or English units, and either a 12-hour or 24-hour time display. </p><p>• AccuWeather widgets are available for your home screens that link directly to AccuWeather. </p><p>Start accessing the most accurate and current weather information available through Google TV or your Android tablet.
